alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Edgecombe and southeastern Halifax Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Rich Square to near Scotland Neck to near Tarboro. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tarboro, Scotland Neck, Hobgood, Speed, Leggett, Tillery and Kingsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
